Detailed Description

Watches for changes in content of a sysfs attribute.

The values of the sysfs attribute are {"0", "1"}. The BoolSysfsPoller emits the stateChanged signal whenever the attribute value changes.

void ContextD::BoolSysFsPooler::readState (  )  [private]

Reads the current state from the observed file (0, 1 or Unknown).

Emits the stateChanged if the new state is different then the previous one.
